ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisAppointment of PATRIC FRANCIS WHYTE of Oakville, Ontario, to be a full-time Vice-Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective November 5, 2012.
